channel.title: Adding a timer to be able to trade/drop/attack players?
channel.description:
Okay, so, my server will be an economical one, but, there's a 10 million GP starter, along with 2000 sharks, and, I was wondering, does anyone know how to add a timer? So that, upon logging in, you must have at least 60 minutes of game time, to be able to trade & drop, and 30 minutes of game time to be able to attack PLAYERS? I thought it was something like
actionInterval > 60000) {
Or something, but I can't remember the code, will rep++
